name: RoundAbout (itch) (Coem)
description:
A little guy in a spinning world seeking love 

Made for the Kenney jam 2021 - Rotation

Movement: WAD / ⬆⬅➡/ space 
Rotate : Q/E

This game can be play within 5 to 15 minutes - but take your time no rush ;)

I am looking forward to your comments and suggestions :)

Thank you Kenney for your amazing work!
